Y(12984) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3579, 30392}

Y(12984) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {165, 3576, 8148}, {3579, 30392, 517}, {8148, 15178, 33179}, {34556, 34557, 7982}

Y(12984) = radical center of (A,t*sa), (B,t*sb) and (C,t*sc) for t=1/6
